sources.title: Border Vengeance
sources.description: A rancher is murdered after discovering that his cattle have been rustled. A neighboring family is accused of the crime and flees across the border and tries to find the real killers. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Border Vengeance  (1935) REB RUSSELL
sources.description:
Stars: Reb Russell, Mary Jane Carey, Kenneth MacDonald
 Director: Ray Heinz

 A rancher is murdered after discovering that 40 head of his cattle have been rustled. A neighboring family is accused of the crime and flees across the border, then tries to find the real killers to clear their name!

metadata.Plot: Flash Purdue incites the ranchers by accusing the Benson family of murder. They are warned in time and cross the border to safety. Muley Benson however stays and joins the rodeo circuit. Five years later he gets a request to return. Arriving he is made a prisoner by Flash who now plans to kill him for having shot him in the ear earlier when he called the Benson's murderers.
metadata.Actors: Reb Russell, Rebel, Mary Jane Carey
